sqlMap.select: SELECT trim(MAPNG_CREAT_ID) AS "mapCreatId" FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS WHERE AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE FROM COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #searchKeyword# ) group by MAPNG_CREAT_ID
SELECT CONCAT(MAPNG_FILE_PATH, MAPNG_FILE_NM) AS "bndeFileNm" FROM COMTNSITEMAP WHERE trim(MAPNG_CREAT_ID) = #searchKeyword#
